dialogue.speaker: WELLES
dialogue.text: Five thousand now, five thousand on delivery. Two women, one white and one black, as long as they have large breasts. Hard bondage, or course.  Other than that, trusting your artistic interpretation, I have only two stipulations.

dialogue.speaker: WELLES
dialogue.text: I want to watch you work.

dialogue.speaker: WELLES
dialogue.text: And the other performer... it has to be that monster you use... the man in the mask.

dialogue.speaker: WELLES
dialogue.text: If it's not him, there's no deal.
